# <a name="insert-pictures-in-an-email-message-or-calendar-event"></a><span data-ttu-id="c2490-102">Umetanje slika u e-poruci ili događaju u kalendaru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c2490-102">Insert pictures in an email message or calendar event</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c2490-103">Možete da umećete fotografije, GIF ili clipart sa računara ili iz usluge OneDrive kao umetnute slike u Outlook.com e-porukama, događajima u kalendaru ili potpisu e-poruke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c2490-103">You can insert photos, gifs, or clipart from your computer or OneDrive as inline images in your Outlook.com email messages, calendar events, or email signature.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="c2490-104">Započnite pisanje poruke ili kreiranje događaja u kalendaru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c2490-104">Begin composing a message or creating a calendar event.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="c2490-105">Izaberite ikonu " **Umetni slike** "</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c2490-105">Select the **Insert pictures inline** icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="c2490-106">pri dnu prozora za pisanje (pored ikone " **Priloži** "</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c2490-106">at the bottom of the compose window (next to the **Attach** icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /><span data-ttu-id="c2490-107">).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c2490-107">).</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="c2490-108">Odaberite sliku koju želite da umetnete i izaberite stavku **Otvori**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c2490-108">Choose the picture you want to insert and select **Open**.</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="c2490-109">Prevucite uglove da biste promenili veličinu slike.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c2490-109">Drag the corners to resize the image.</span></span>
5. <span data-ttu-id="c2490-110">Kliknite desnim tasterom miša na sliku da biste videli opcije oblikovanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c2490-110">Right-click the image to see formatting options.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c2490-111">Pročitajte više o tome kako da [priložite datoteke u Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/8d7c1ea7-4e5f-44ce-bb6e-c5fcc92ba9ab?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c2490-111">Read more about how to [attach files in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/8d7c1ea7-4e5f-44ce-bb6e-c5fcc92ba9ab?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
